snippet: Boeing Co has accepted 1,880 voluntary layoffs from its union machinists and engineers in the Seattle area, the unions said on Thursday, part of the jet maker's drive to cut costs through job reductions and other measures....

headline.main: U.S. Prosecutors Fight Ruling Limiting Foreign Bribery Cases
headline.print_headline: U.S. Prosecutors Fight Ruling Limiting Foreign Bribery Cases

lead_paragraph: Boeing Co has accepted 1,880 voluntary layoffs from its union machinists and engineers in the Seattle area, the unions said on Thursday, part of the jet maker's drive to cut costs through job reductions and other measures.
